sentences.english: BE, baby yesterday is also individually see, definite is very exquisite.
sentences.chinese: 是，孩儿昨天也是亲眼所见，确实是非常玄妙。

sentences.english: Loves had arrived place, was keeping yesterday's fragrance according to the past.
sentences.chinese: 爱曾经来到过的地方，依昔留着昨天的芬芳。

sentences.english: The exchange rate fluctuates every day.
sentences.chinese: 今天的汇率比昨天稍微低一点儿。

sentences.english: Yes, yesterday was the my pay-day; I pay you the payment today.
sentences.chinese: 是地，昨天是咋哒发薪日，俺今天付给你报酬。

sentences.english: I bought a new turtleneck yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我买了一件新的高领绒衣。

sentences.english: I bought some "Longjing Tea" yesterday, why don't you have some?
sentences.chinese: 我昨天刚买了些龙井茶，你尝尝看。

sentences.english: This morning I went to the shop to change the coat I bought yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 今天早晨我去服装店调换我昨天在那买的一件衣服。

sentences.english: It rained yesterday after it had been dry for many months.
sentences.chinese: 在天旱了好几个月之后，昨天下雨了。

sentences.english: Yesterday my brother and I went to catch crabs again.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我又和哥哥一起去捉螃蟹了。

sentences.english: "This case is no different than any other case, " Lott said yesterday.
sentences.chinese: “这只是一件普通的案子而已，”洛特昨天表示。

sentences.english: We saw a film yesterday. Its name was Speed.
sentences.chinese: 我们昨天看了一场电影，片名是《生死时速》。

sentences.english: Hong Kong TVB actress Yung Mei Ling was discovered dead at her home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 香港无线电视演员容美玲被发现死在家里昨天。

sentences.english: I called on Mr. Lee yesterday.
Saved the meteorological observatory evening to issue the Zhejiang coastal area strong typhoon urgent alarm yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 省气象台昨天傍晚发布浙江沿海地区强台风紧急警报。

sentences.english: It was in the zoo that Xiao Yang met your sister.
sentences.chinese: 小杨昨天是在动物园碰到你妹妹的。
